body: Alhamdulillaah, through the support of generous donors, we achieved & completed PHASE I in February 2017. With the grace of Allah Taâ€™ala, now we are at the start of commencing PHASE II of this project, for which we need to raise US $500,000. All the brothers & sisters are humbly requested to Donate Generously towards this cause.
A Humble Appeal is being made to our brothers and sisters for donating your Zakaat and Sadaqat to Madani Memorial for its humanitarian relief and educational projects.

Madani Memorial provides timely help to the poor and needy by providing food, clean water, basic education, building houses in disaster affected areas and helping orphans and widows by providing monthly ration and help them stand on their own.
